title: Remove Vivan portrait photo from the hero section

requirements.text: Remove the portrait photo of Vivan Pathak from the top Hero section so the page no longer displays the image currently rendered from `/assets/generated/vivan-hero.dim_1200x1500.jpg`, and adjust the Hero layout to remain visually balanced and responsive on mobile and desktop without the photo.
acceptanceCriteria: The Hero section no longer renders the `` that displays Vivan Pathakâ€™s portrait (currently sourced from `/assets/generated/vivan-hero.dim_1200x1500.jpg`).
Hero section content (headline, copy, and stat cards) remains readable, centered/laid out cleanly, and responsive across mobile and desktop breakpoints (no awkward empty column or spacing).
No other sections (Highlights, Aircraft photo section, modals, footer) are removed or broken by the layout change.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Do not add new backend services or databases; backend remains a single Motoko actor.
nonGoals: Removing the Boeing 737 aircraft photo section or any existing aviation imagery used elsewhere on the page
Deleting the photo asset files from the repository (only removing it from the rendered UI)
Changing existing congratulatory copy beyond what is necessary to fix layout after removing the photo
